current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To require certain financial regulators to determine whether new regulations or orders are
			 duplicative or inconsistent with existing Federal regulations, and for
			 other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

			 the requirements of this subsection.
